articles.title: Astronomers capture the birth of a new solar system for the first time ever - Earth.com
articles.summary: Astronomers capture the birth of a new solar system for the first time ever Astronomers caught a star system at the moment when solid grains began to form planets. This snapshot reveals how planets first start to form, just as Earth once did. The infant star HOPS-315 sits about 1,300 light-years, roughly 7. 6 quadrillion miles, away in the constellation...
